instrument.name: Stocks
instrument.Description: Type of security that gives stockholders a share of ownership in a company.

instrument.name: Mutual Funds
instrument.Description: Pooled collection of assets that invests in stocks, bonds, and other securities.

instrument.name: Crypto
instrument.Description: Digital currency that uses encryption techniques to regulate the generation of units and verify the transfer of funds

instrument.name: Bonds
instrument.Description: Fixed-income instrument that represents a loan made by an investor to a borrower
